About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a Full-Stack Web Developer located in Charlotte, NC with over 6 years of Systems Engineering experience. In 2018 the decision to enroll in the UNC Charlotte Full-Stack Coding Bootcamp has been one of the most rewarding yet challenging experiences to date, allowing me to pursue software development quicker. I stay up to date on new technolgies by spending too much time on Reddit, Youtube, and Udemy. When I am not working on personal projects attempting to become a software guru, I am climbing a mountian somewhere (New Zealand is amazing!), traveling with my amazing wife, or playing with our dog Jace.


If you feel I can help you or be a good addition to your team/project, feel free to reach out to me!

Brocon Inc

Account Manager/IT Consultant

Own and effectively manage all aspects of client and project specific budgets, including working with potential clients from lead to project completion. Responsible for establishing, growing and maintaining existing client relationships. Provide IT consulting by recommending solutions to increase business profitability and efficiency.

Axiom Technology Group

Field Service Engineer

Provide systems engineering services for small to mid-market organizations across many environments and industries through remote and onsite support. Work closely with project team implementing IT solutions as needed. Manage and monitor all IT systems and infrastructure as the full time engineer on-site at multiple client. Assist management to provide solutions to clients to increase profitability and efficiency. Travel as needed to implement IT projects and provide support.

Con Edison

Systems Engineer

Onsite member of internal IT infrastructure team supporting 300+ users in an enterprise environment. Manage and monitor all installed systems and infrastructure utilized by the company. Monitor and test application performance and provide solutions for the VDI environment. (Citrix/VMware) Manage all user hardware including new hire/terminations and upgrades. Provide level 2 - 3 support as needed.
